title: (28491) Navacerrada - 9A Calle Presbítero Blanco
description:
Free public parking just behind the local police office. To enter this place you must have access between the police building and El Porrón Restaurant.
At the corner of the entrance you can see a yellow sign indicating the direction to this public parking.
It is a place protected from the wind and very quiet since it is located between urbanized areas and although it is very close to the center, no noise or traffic is heard.
It has a large park but the nearest fountain is in Plaza del Gargantón a few meters away and from which you can catch water but not load tanks with hose.
At the moment it is of beaten earth and it is a very calm place.
Prohibited to remove tables, chairs or any other camping element. Please respect the environment and use the bins.

Village center 5 minutes walk.

title: (40410) El Espinar - 13 Paseo Quintana
description: Very quiet parking next to a river and with nature. you can walk to town

title: (40270) Carbonero el Mayor - SG-V-3321
description: On a large ground possibility to deviate from the road very little passing. Very peaceful night.

title: (40440) Santa María la Real de Nieva - 12P Calle Costanilla
title_short: (40440) Santa María la Real de Nieva - 12P Calle Costanilla
description: Wide street, without traffic, 20 meters from the center and the monastery.

address.city: Santa María la Real de Nieva

title: (28742) Lozoya - 2 Avenida de Lozoya
description: Quiet parking at the entrance of the village at the lake. The night is peaceful.

title: (28492) El Boalo - 22 M-617
description: Parking next to Mataelpino from where a route leaves to crown Maliciosa. A little uneven, without services. The bad thing is that at night on weekends the "fornicas" of the area go with the thud and when they leave the picoletos appear and they wake you up with bangs and then apologize because totally, the parking is not not prohibited. Better during the week.

title: (28492) Mataelpino - 14 Calle del Pocillo
description: Dirt parking on the outskirts of town, next to the Camino de Santiago. Dirt parking in the upper part of the town, at the exit towards La Maliciosa and La Barranca. The Camino de Santiago and a cattle route pass by, a little further on there is a cattle resting place with a large trough where dogs can cool off very comfortably. Very quiet and discreet place to spend the night although it is within the town. Nearby there are shops and the town square, where there is a fountain and bathrooms. There is also a hostel for pilgrims. From that point there are two super nice roads, one to the west along the livestock route and the other to the east through the Sierra de los Porrones, with spectacular views). At the foot of Maliciosa, in the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park. There are many routes, PR, GR, Camino de Santiago... La Pedriza, La Barranca and Puerto de Navacerrada are also nearby.

title: (28741) Miraflores de la Sierra - Calle Puerto de la Morcuera
title_short: (28741) Miraflores de la Sierra - Calle Puerto de la Morcuera
description: Parking Puerto de la Morcuera, very quiet, somewhat inclined, hiking routes around.

title: (28492) El Boalo - 72P Avenida de los Linares
title_short: (28492) El Boalo - 72P Avenida de los Linares
description: Wooded parking in the center of the village. It is a quiet place to stay overnight, even if it is in the city. There is a large parking lot, in the upper part it is more hidden from view and there is a lot of shade. It is in the center but it is discreet and very calm. Opposite there are shops and next to it is the town square, where there is a fountain and wc. At the foot of the Maliciosa, in the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park. There are many trails, PR, GR, Camino de Santiago ... it is also near La Pedriza, La Barranca and Puerto de Navacerrada.

title: (28742) Lozoya - 4 Calle Fuente Hernando
description: Easy access calm even if near road. Access on foot to qlq hundreds of meters. No convenience

title: (40151) Ituero y Lama - N-110
description: Narrow passage at the start, rolling road, but arrived on small grassy esplanade. Very pleasant. A little noise of cars but for one night it's quieter.

title: (28492) Mataelpino - 30 Calle Manuel de Falla
description: Large flat and quiet land parking with beautiful views.

title: (40183) Muñoveros - 9D Calle de Carraturegano
description:
Private restaurant farmhouse with swimming pool
Reservation of restaurant menus by prior order and subject to availability. Roast Segovia, lamb, suckling pig, beans, stew, shank (consult the menu).
allow overnight stay and indoor swimming pool with shower and toilets, reservations by telephone

title: (40400) El Espinar - Unnamed Road
description: A very quiet place with beautiful views. There is a source of drinking water nearby.Night prohibited

title: (28492) Manzanares el Real - 3 Camino Canto Cochino
title_short: (28492) Manzanares el Real - 3 Camino Canto Cochino
description: Car parking without problem for motorhomes, overnight allowed from October to April, no mobile coverage.

title: (28742) Lozoya - Calle del Arco de la Iglesia
title_short: (28742) Lozoya - Calle del Arco de la Iglesia

address.street: Calle del Arco de la Iglesia

title: (28742) Lozoya - Calle del Arco de la Iglesia
title_short: (28742) Lozoya - Calle del Arco de la Iglesia

address.street: Calle del Arco de la Iglesia

title: (28490) Becerril de la Sierra - Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
title_short: (28490) Becerril de la Sierra - Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
description: A hidden place. I did not have to activate all-wheel drive but a motorhome will not pass well up to here

title: (40162) Ceguilla - 8 Calle el Raso
description: Public area of ​​motorhomes with all the services well located to be able to go skiing to the mountain range of guadarrama since a bus leaves from the same area. Located in a very quiet and cozy village with sports center located in the same area with park and paddle court invluidas

name: Área de Servicio Navatrans
title: (40280) Área de Servicio Navatrans
description:
Service station area, motorway A 601 exit 80.
It has LPG gas, restaurant, WiFi, car wash etc.
Ample parking, the shower service if you refuel or eat/dinner is free. It has a water change, water and van wash. Very quiet and very friendly staff and very clean area. Very close to Segovia and Madrid. Highly recommended for overnight.

title: (28492) Manzanares el Real - 6 Camino Canto Cochino
title_short: (28492) Manzanares el Real - 6 Camino Canto Cochino
description: Parking in the natural park, do not attract attention with table and chairs. A place popular with rich people. No water and close by there a bar that has the toilet.

title: (28742) Lozoya - Calle del Arco de la Iglesia
title_short: (28742) Lozoya - Calle del Arco de la Iglesia
description: Take the exit at Lozoya, direction Madrid. We pass in front of a firefighter installation "bomberos". We asked them if we could park and they said yes. Lake view, superb.

address.street: Calle del Arco de la Iglesia

title: (40173) - SG-P-2322
description: Parking of a small church. Not far from the road but quiet. It's better than pedraza where you can really hear dogs.

title: (28490) Becerril de la Sierra - 2 Avenida de las Flores
title_short: (28490) Becerril de la Sierra - 2 Avenida de las Flores

title: (28742) Lozoya - Calle del Arco de la Iglesia
title_short: (28742) Lozoya - Calle del Arco de la Iglesia

address.street: Calle del Arco de la Iglesia

title: (28413) El Boalo - 9 Calle Cañada
description: Nice views, nearby fountain and picnic tables, dumpsters, good place to run and bike, climb 30mins. Quiet place to sleep.

title: (28450) Collado Mediano - 3 Calle de los Sauces
title_short: (28450) Collado Mediano - 3 Calle de los Sauces
description: A fairly flat parking lot. There is a bar nearby, very quiet at night.

title: (40173) Arahuetes - 11 Plaza Mayor
description: Plaza de Arahuete, also called Sagrillas in the television series Cuentame, very close to Pedraza, possibility of parking and spending the day or night very quiet, in a very beautiful and authentic town, you can breathe peace and tranquility. There is no type of service, no bar or bakery. In Pedraza there is a good looking oven, which loses it when you enter and they have the bread reserved for restoration.

title: (40150) Villacastín - 22D Paseo Carrascal
description: It is a small and quiet playground just in front of the hermitage. It is not too flat but it is quiet for a night's sleep.

title: (28413) El Boalo - 6 M-617
description: Great place to come and relax after visiting Madrid. All services clean and free, large parking area for motorhomes with views to the Sierras. Town has bakery, small supermarket and a couple of bars. New bollards with electrical supply but not commission yet.

title: (40447) Nieva - 3 SG-342
description: Place with tables and games for children with shade, water and easy paths to walk, ideal for stopping to rest.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 12 Calle de la Sierra
description: Parking for cars and RVs. You can spend the night here during the week and outside of events. Then many cars park here and it will be difficult to get out again. We visited the medieval market. Very quiet during the week. Without services.

title: (40150) Villacastín - Autopista del Noroeste
description: Autogrill area h24 convenient for stopping one night without leaving the main road

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carretera de La Jarosa
description: Beautiful spots among the pine trees, Reservoir close by for walking around with dogs. Lots of walking tracks in the hill also! There is a little church and cafe but they weren’t open while we were there. We stayed for 3 nights with out a problem. Lots of rubbish bins around the site. There are a few little spots of the road running around the lake with ample amount of space for several motorhome . Only 45 mins from Madrid

title: (28413) El Boalo - 18 Calle de la Peña Hoyuela
title_short: (28413) El Boalo - 18 Calle de la Peña Hoyuela
description: Parking in the center of the village 3 minutes from the plaza del ayuntamiento, very quiet for the night.

title: (28413) El Boalo - 2 Avenida de la Paz
title_short: (28413) El Boalo - 2 Avenida de la Paz
description: Parking in raised ground on a municipal ground. It is a quiet place to spend the night, even if it is in the village. It is very close to El Boalo access to La Pedriza. In a large park where there are sports fields, a fountain, etc. Area with very nice views and lots of shade. Wooded and sheltered. At City Hall, they told us it was ok if they are not long stays. The first week of July, apparently, there is a feria. Maybe there are more difficulties. We had two nights without problems, there was only one other van. Great for walking in the Sierra.

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 33 Avenida de la Pedriza
title_short: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 33 Avenida de la Pedriza
description: Stop next to the Manzanares river. Spectacular view of La Pedriza. Good place to start a walking tour. There is room for at least three motorhomes. Going down you cross a bridge over the river that is evocative.

title: (28743) Canencia - Calle Cantarranas
description: Parking in the recreation area, with water, basutras and banks ... Many walking routes. Better than at the end of the road.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carr de la jarosa
description: Good parking to spend the night without any more noise.

title: (28743) Canencia - 147 Calle Diseminado
description: Great esplanade to spend the night, quiet place surrounded by nature. Easy access by a road in good condition for any vehicle, there is no height limit. We spent the night there, advised by the Forest Agents after we got kicked out of the Pto Canencia recreational area due to "the covid" ... they told us that there we would have no problems staying overnight and that's how it was.

title: (40280) Navalmanzano - SG-222
description: Abandoned picnic area, quiet and shadowed. Good entrance by paved road near the curve to Fuentepelayo

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carr de la Jarosa
description: One of the 3 car parks that the reservoir has. It is the furthest (one kilometer from the first) but it is worth it for its tranquility to sleep. The reservoir is next door, you can have dinner next to the reservoir (with your chairs, table and food) and enjoy a night under the stars. Natural environment and very quiet. There is no service. It depends on whether you are in the car park. In the previous car park, about 500 meters away, there is a restaurant.

title: (28440) Guadarrama -
description: Very large parking lot under the pine trees located near a bar, early morning hiker, 20 minutes from Valle los Caidos and 1:00 from Madrid. Access with nasturtium cc and 7 meters long. There is very clean service.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carretera de La Jarosa
description: Beautiful place to spend the night in nature listening to the cows and with the possibility of having breakfast looking at the reservoir. recommendable

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 5B Calle de los Escoriales
description: For troubleshooting, NON-DRINKING water at the service station.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 5 Calle de los Escoriales
description: Parking behind the supermarket with many places for any size. Did not slept here, but used to visit the city

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Río Guadiana
description: Large esplanade with part in shadow next to several gas stations with shop and a Supercor. Very quiet, even at the Guadarrama parties.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 21 Calle Fuente del Espino
description: Quiet street for parking with chalets on both sides. We have spent the night very very well. Recommended for a rest stop.

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real - Avenida de Mataelpino
title_short: (28410) Manzanares el Real - Avenida de Mataelpino
description: Manzanares el Real; area on the side of the road, dirty.

title: (40150) Villacastín - 52 Calle Ávila
description: Large area of land to park and spend a quiet night. There are usually trucks parked, so you are calm because you are not alone, but there is no noise. Highly recommended if you can't find another place to sleep.

title: (28412) Moralzarzal - 11B Urbanización la Herradura
description: Public parking next to Mercadona in a relatively quiet place. Short level spaces within the parking lot. Possibility of parking in line in front with any size.

title: (28792) Miraflores de la Sierra - 63D Avenida de Madrid
title_short: (28792) Miraflores de la Sierra - 63D Avenida de Madrid

title: (28792) Miraflores de la Sierra - 10 Calle de la Cumbre
title_short: (28792) Miraflores de la Sierra - 10 Calle de la Cumbre
description: Super quiet in the middle of a forest, a bit inclined, the source of the priest (500 meters before arriving here, it works to fill the water tank), two hiking trails, one around this mountain and a other famous towards Rascafría. Only 2 spaces.

title: (28411) Moralzarzal - 3 Calle de la Tejera
description: Public parking of the Tejera. Fairly quiet. Next to a park with tables and trees. There are services, but they are closed. In the park there is a fountain. Next to the town, with all the services; Supermarket, bar, restaurant, hardware store. Ideal for walking or cycling routes

title: (28413) -
description: Area with tables and chairs, the river passes next to it, half an hour walk to Manzanares del Real. You cannot stay overnight.

title: (40173) Pedraza - 9006 Calle Real
description: Next to the river next to the scale of the town there is room for several motorhomes without noise although it is close to the road

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 2 Diseminado los Algibes
title_short: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 2 Diseminado los Algibes
description:
Silent parking for the night, overcrowded on weekends, close to many trekking and the climbing Area "La raja" 
Small river nearby . No drinking water or trash. Keep the place clean!

title: (28792) Miraflores de la Sierra - 1611 Calle Diseminado
title_short: (28792) Miraflores de la Sierra - 1611 Calle Diseminado
description: Quiet place near Miraflores.

title: (28412) El Boalo - 579 Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
title_short: (28412) El Boalo - 579 Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
description: Picnic area at the entrance to the town of Cerceda coming from Madrid. There is a small flat area to leave the van and picnic tables and rubbish bins. It is attached to the road but does not have much traffic at night.

title: (40172) Pedraza - 8 Calle de La Florida
description: Parking for day and night, with a large volume camper, you enter the town of Pedraza narrow but well. The arch is tall enough but the width is just right for a van. Motorhomes or dreaming!

title: (40172) Pedraza - 19 Calle Mayor
description: Parking in the castle of Pedraza. Not suitable for caravans as they are not allowed to enter the city. There is a lot of room. Some leveled and others on the ground. Without services

name: Camping Monte Holiday
title: (28739) Camping Monte Holiday
description: Beautiful campsite in the mountains for a good price. Loads of hiking nearby. Staff incredibly helpful.

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real -
description: Municipal car park next to the roundabout that goes in the direction of La Pedriza. Open from 8 to 22. Good option for large vehicles

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 3 Calle de Colmenar
title_short: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 3 Calle de Colmenar
description: Free public parking. Perfect to visit the castle. I haven't spent the night here but there were many RVs and vans that stayed here overnight.

title: (28411) Moralzarzal - 36 Calle España
description: Laundry at the Meroil petrol station 5 min walk from the Moralzarzal district.

title: (40172) Pedraza - 1 Calle de las Cuestas
description: Pedraza, perhaps the most beautiful town in Spain, a difficult area to park motorhomes, the large ones do not enter through the entrance arch, possibility of parking and spending the night, an area with an acceptable slope, a very pleasant walk through the town, great grilled meats in some of its typical restaurants

title: (40172) Pedraza - 1 Calle de las Cuestas
description: Parking before Pedraza. You can not enter with a motorhome in Pedraza.

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real -
description: Parking with very good views. It has no services but nobody has bothered us. Traffic noise

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 24 Calle de la Pasada
description: Nice place in the mountains of Madrid, surrounded by nature, there are quarries but bathing is prohibited, a fishing spot, ample flat parking and with the possibility of many hiking and MTB routes

title: (40172) Pedraza - SG-V-2512
description: Parking at aquaduct of Pedraza. Quiet spot except for some dogs barking now and then. At 500 meters from medieval town of Pedraza. NO services!

name: Camping El Valle
title: (28720) Camping El Valle
description: Camping El Valle. Quiet, family friendly, with lots of flowers and trees for shady pitches. It looks old but be careful. Especially with fixed people with Mobil home but also plots with / without electricity and bungalows. It has a summer pool. Views of the mountains, beautiful area

title: (05291) Maello - Carretera N-VI madrid Coruña
description: Ample parking next to a very tasty and pleasant restaurant. We spent a night passing through and no problem. The owners of the bar have no problem with overnight stays. rural road behind to walk with furry.

name: Camping Valle Enmedio
title: (05239) Camping Valle Enmedio
description: Valle de enmedio campsite, an excellent place to hike through the Sierra de Guadarrama natural park. spacious pitches, some with some unevenness.

name: Camping La Nava
title: (05239) Camping La Nava
description:
Very large campsite with free pitches. Very quiet even on weekends. A few permanent caravans. Friendly welcome. Internet only by wifi at the bar. No network in the campsite.
Much quieter than the Enmedio campsite next door. No swimming pool.

address.street: Carretera de Peguerinos- Alto del León KM 3600

title: (40295) Mudrián -
description: In a magnificent pine forest, there are dirt roads that allow you to isolate yourself and enjoy the peace and nature... no prohibition signs... rather for cells, vans or small vans. In the morning (a Thursday in mid-April) no hikers, no hunters, no foresters and we left the place at noon! Ideal before going to see the castle of Coca.

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 32B Calle de Santa Quiteria
description: Parking place where many cars enter and there is a lot of space. Right in front there is a huge park with skate park soccer fields and a fountain

title: (05239) Peguerinos - Camino de los Rajuelos
description: La Nava Recreational Area, next to the Campings. Little mobile coverage. Spacious, level, without services, only with fountain and barbecues to use except the summer months. Quiet at night but very popular during the day on weekends. Nice place and with hiking trails.

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 32 Calle del Licenciado Vidriera
description: Quiet parking with the possibility of routes

title: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - s/n Carretera de Guadarrama
title_short: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - s/n Carretera de Guadarrama
description: Parking to visit the basilica, available during opening hours. you have to pay at the entrance of the site, except Sunday which is free for EU nationals ...

title: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Unnamed Road
title_short: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Unnamed Road
description: Parking once past the entrance to the Valle de Los Caídos by the bus door, take the direction of the monastery and you will find a very large parking. Only open at the time of the visits.

name: Dehesa Park
title: (28400) Dehesa Park
description: Dehesa Park car park. Area with trees. Picnic area, fountains, circuit of about 4 km surrounded by cows, bulls, horses... Chiringuito nearby. About 10 minutes walk from the village of Villalba with all services (pharmacy-opencor-bakery-shops, municipal swimming pool and restaurants).

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 13 Calle 6 Sau
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 13 Calle 6 Sau
description: It is a 24h Carrefour express gas station, it will be the first night here I suppose it will be good for us, since we have many truckers also resting here, the good thing that we also have is that you can buy at the same gas station for an emergency I hope it helps

title: (28739) San Mamés - 4 Calle de la Fuente
title_short: (28739) San Mamés - 4 Calle de la Fuente
description: Public parking without services. Gravel and dirt floor, not very well leveled. Nearby fountain, garbage bins and picnic tables in an adjacent area. Charming town. You have to visit the Chorrera de San Mamés, impressive waterfall, about 4 kms upstream.

title: (28720) Bustarviejo - 1T Calle Cuesta del Cantón
description: Picnic place with free parking at 50m surrounded by nature

title: (28720) Bustarviejo - 1T Calle Cuesta del Cantón
description: Flat area near the road, in front you can also stop further from the road. You can catch water nearby. Collado fountain, with bar and pick nick tables, silver mine route, nature walks. Garden next door that sells its products

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Autopista del Noroeste
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Autopista del Noroeste
description: Parking in the Service area of the Cepsa gas station, if you come on the A6 towards Madrid, to rest before entering Madrid, we spend the night and sleep is fine, at 23.00 the gas station and the bar close until 7 , 00 so there is little movement, except for a few trucker who stop to rest.
